page.title: 13ROSSENDALE CALENDER
page.content: If you visit Rossendale during the year here are some events:- {April}1st Sunday Slow Melody & Quartet Contest (Brass Bands held at All Saints School) 1st Tuesday Dinner Boxing & Cabaret (Boxing Schools held at the Astoria) {May}3rd Sunday Criterium (Road Race) Bocholt Way,Rawtenstall. {June}3rd Sunday It's a 999 Knockout (Marl Pits) Last Saterday Rossendale Carnival {July}1st Sunday Rossendale Pony Club Show 2nd Sunday Rossendale Country Fair Last week July 1st week August Rawtenstall annual holiday {August}Last Sat/Sun Horticultural Show(Astoria) {September}1st Sunday Round the hills walk {October}Annual Bird Caged Show
